alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 28 at 1:02AM MST until January 28 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Superior, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Superior
